2011-05-28

BtVS: Beauty & the Beasts

Buffy sees a counselor/psychologist - he seems nice (which is I think quite rare for a smoker on TV)... so obviously he succumbs to Rule of Buffy #1.

After all my Oz is cool posts it is worth mentioning that he does look rather silly in werewolf-mode.

And there's Faith... oh Faith. She rocks, she rolls and she's here to punch Buffy's lights out... accidentally this time...

Hmm... those last two paras may suggest that my allegiances are changing.
